questions.question: Who is the lead singer of the band 'Coldplay'?
questions.explanation: Chris Martin is the lead singer of the band 'Coldplay'.

questions.question: Which actor played the character 'Iron Man' in the Marvel Cinematic Universe?
questions.explanation: Robert Downey Jr. played the character 'Iron Man' in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

questions.question: What is the highest-grossing film of all time?
questions.explanation: Avengers: Endgame is the highest-grossing film of all time.

questions.question: Who won the Best Actor award at the 2020 Academy Awards?
questions.explanation: Joaquin Phoenix won the Best Actor award at the 2020 Academy Awards.

questions.question: Which singer released the hit song 'Bad Guy'?
questions.explanation: Billie Eilish released the hit song 'Bad Guy'.

questions.question: Who is the director of the movie 'Inception'?
Which TV show features the character 'Walter White'?
questions.explanation: The TV show 'Breaking Bad' features the character 'Walter White'.

questions.question: Who wrote the novel 'To Kill a Mockingbird'?
questions.explanation: Harper Lee wrote the novel 'To Kill a Mockingbird'.

questions.question: Which artist painted the 'Mona Lisa'?
questions.explanation: Leonardo da Vinci painted the 'Mona Lisa'.

questions.question: Which country is the birthplace of the Olympic Games?
questions.explanation: The Olympic Games originated in Greece.

questions.question: Who is the author of the 'Harry Potter' book series?
questions.explanation: J.K. Rowling is the author of the 'Harry Potter' book series.

questions.question: Which planet is known as the 'Red Planet'?
questions.explanation: Mars is known as the 'Red Planet'.

questions.question: Who is the lead vocalist of the band 'Queen'?
questions.explanation: Freddie Mercury is the lead vocalist of the band 'Queen'.

questions.question: Which city is the capital of Australia?
questions.explanation: Canberra is the capital of Australia.

questions.question: Which actress played the character 'Katniss Everdeen' in the 'Hunger Games' film series?
questions.explanation: Jennifer Lawrence played the character 'Katniss Everdeen' in the 'Hunger Games' film series.
